title: The TUNE page is used to tune the aircraft's radios, select …
caption_en: The TUNE page is used to tune the aircraft's radios, select and store preselected frequencies for each radio, and to view the selected frequencies (active and preset) for each radio. Touch the TUNE function key.

title: When first accessed, the page will initially display the las…
caption_en: When first accessed, the page will initially display the last tuned radio with cursor over the active frequency.

title: The selectable radios are displayed next to the line select …
caption_en: The selectable radios are displayed next to the line select keys and a control window is located in the centre of the display. Any applicable radio may be placed into the control window by pressing the line select key for that radio.

title: The control window shows the selected radio, the active freq…
caption_en: The control window shows the selected radio, the active frequency, and up to four preset frequencies.

title: Watch how frequency is selected on COM.
caption_en: Watch how frequency is selected on COM.

title: Watch how preset frequency number 4 is entered. When a new f…
caption_en: Watch how preset frequency number 4 is entered. When a new frequency is being entered, ACT disappears until the ENTER key is pressed and the radio responds.

title: The TUNE page has a Recall line, which will always contain t…
caption_en: The TUNE page has a Recall line, which will always contain the last frequency used whenever a new frequency is entered into the ACTIVE window.

title: The Key swaps the frequency with the current ACTIVE frequenc…
caption_en: The Key swaps the frequency with the current ACTIVE frequency. Touch the

title: Cursor movement in the control window is controlled using th…
caption_en: Cursor movement in the control window is controlled using the ENTER key. If the ENTER key is pressed and nothing new has been entered into the active frequency, the cursor will advance to preset position 1. Watch

title: Each time the ENTER is pressed, the cursor will move down on…
caption_en: Each time the ENTER is pressed, the cursor will move down one preset position. After preset position 4, the cursor will return to the home position (active frequency)

title: The preset frequencies are changed or entered by placing the…
caption_en: The preset frequencies are changed or entered by placing the cursor over the desired preset position, inputting the new frequency and then pressing the ENTER key. The new frequency may be input directly through the numeric keys or by inputting the reference number of one of the preset frequencies. Touch ADVANCE to see the change in the frequency.

title: Pressing ENTER key will move the cursor down to the next pre…
caption_en: Pressing ENTER key will move the cursor down to the next preset frequency. The next preset frequency can be changed likewise.

title: The ATC line select key us used to gain access to control of…
caption_en: The ATC line select key us used to gain access to control of the transponder codes. Preselects 3 and 4 are prefilled with codes and respectively.
